description: This source file implements utility functions for handling PKCS12 cryptographic operations such as key derivation, encryption, decryption, hashing, and MAC authentication, primarily used in cryptographic processing of PKCS12 data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreatePKCS12Utility(ANSC_HANDLE hContainer,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a PKCS12 utility interface object, setting up cryptographic API references and utility method pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Frees memory and releases resources associated with the PKCS12 utility interface object.

methods.name: BOOLEAN PKCS12UtilityPasswordToBMPString(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PCHAR password,PUCHAR pString,PULONG pLength)
methods.description: Converts a password string to a BMPString format used in PKCS12 key derivation, ensuring proper Unicode encoding.

methods.name: PUCHAR PKCS12UtilityConcatenateString(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pBBB,ULONG lenOfB,PUCHAR pCCC,ULONG lenOfC,PULONG pLenOfA)
methods.description: Concatenates two byte sequences, used for constructing key derivation material.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityHashString(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pMessage,ULONG lenOfMessage,ULONG iteration,HASH_TYPE hashType,ANSC_HANDLE pHash)
methods.description: Hashes a message multiple times with specified hash algorithm (MD5 or SHA1) to produce key material.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityConcatenateAndHash(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pMessageA,ULONG lenOfMessageA,PUCHAR pMessageB,ULONG lenOfMessageB,ULONG hashIteration,HASH_TYPE hashType,ANSC_HANDLE pHash)
methods.description: Concatenates two messages and hashes the result with multiple iterations, used in key derivation functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityGetDerivedKey(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG KeyID,PCHAR pPasswordString,PUCHAR pSaltString,ULONG lenOfSalt,ULONG iteration,HASH_TYPE hashType,PUCHAR pKey,PULONG pLenOfKey)
methods.description: Derives a cryptographic key based on PKCS12 standards, using diversified parameters such as salt and password.

methods.name: BOOLEAN UpdateStringIII(PUCHAR pIII,PUCHAR pBBB,ULONG length)
methods.description: Increments a byte array interpreted as a big-endian integer, used in PKCS12 key derivation algorithms.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityGetPKCS5DerivedKey(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PCHAR pPasswordString,PUCHAR pSaltString,ULONG lenOfSalt,ULONG iteration,HASH_TYPE hashType,PUCHAR pKeyAndIV,PULONG pLenOfKeyAndIV)
methods.description: Derives keys according to PKCS5 standard, used for PKCS8 and similar structures.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityDecrypt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PKCS12_CRYPTO_ALGOR cryptType,PCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pSaltString,ULONG lenOfSalt,ULONG iteration,PUCHAR pEncryptedData,ULONG lenOfEncryptedData,PUCHAR pDecryptedData,PULONG pLenOfDecryptedData)
methods.description: Performs decryption of encrypted PKCS12 data using specified algorithms, salts, and passwords.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityEncrypt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PKCS12_CRYPTO_ALGOR type,PCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pSaltString,ULONG lenOfSalt,ULONG iteration,PUCHAR pClearData,ULONG lenOfClearData,PUCHAR pCipherData,PULONG pLenOfCipherData)
methods.description: Performs encryption of data for PKCS12 structures, supporting RC2, DES, and RC2 CBC modes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityGetHMAC(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,HASH_TYPE type,PCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pSaltString,ULONG lenOfSalt,ULONG iteration,PUCHAR pMessage,ULONG lenOfMessage,ANSC_HANDLE pHash)
methods.description: Computes HMAC for PKCS12 data using derived keys and hash functions (MD5 or SHA1).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityRC2CBC(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOLEAN isEncrypt,PUCHAR pKey,ULONG lenOfKey,ULONG bits,PUCHAR pIVString,ULONG lenOfIV,PUCHAR pInputString,PUCHAR pOutputString,ULONG lenOfString)
ANSC_STATUS PKCS12UtilityRC2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOLEAN isEncrypt,PUCHAR pKey,ULONG lenOfKey,ULONG bits,PUCHAR pInputString,PUCHAR pOutputString,ULONG lenOfString)
methods.description: Performs RC2 encryption/decryption in ECB mode.
